casebody.data:
THOMAS S. FERRANTE, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. THOMAS McGINNIS, AND FEDERAL INSURANCE COMPANY, JOINTLY, SEVERALLY, AND/OR IN THE ALTERNATIVE, DEFENDANTS-APPELLANTS. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Argued March 7, 1966 — Decided March 16, 1966

Before Judges Goldmann and Dolby.

Mr. Leon A. Wingate, Jr., argued the cause for appellant Federal Insurance Company. Respondent did not file a brief. Pek Cubiam.

Affirmed. Cf. Schlanger v. Federal Ins. Co., 44 N. J. 17 (1965). See also Graybar Electric Co. v. Continental Cas. Co., 50 N. J. Super. 289 (App. Div. 1958).
